storyContent:
After many weeks of traveling as a guard with a merchant’s caravan you arrive at the frontier city West Gate late in the night. After renting a room at a nearby inn for the night, you gratefully collapse into your bed, looking forward to several days off. 
Early in the morning you are rouse from sleep by a commotion outside.

storyChoices.name: You go back to sleep. It’s your day off and you are determined to sleep in.
Investigate what is causing the commotion.
